channel.title: Need help with command
channel.description: how do i make the req lvl for an item lower.. becuz right now in my server the req lvl for dbow is 100 and u cant get 100 i want it to be 80

item.title: Need help with command
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

Hey there, open up your client.java

and search for public int GetCLRanged

And then find your dbow id in the list underneath if (ItemID == 15156) { return 100; }

Where it says return 100;

Change the 100 to the requirement you want, so for 80 your end code would be if (ItemID == 15156) { return 80; }

Read full topic
